block.name: RMS
block.doc: Calculates the RMS value of the input signal.

param.name: Input Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type of the input stream.

param.name: Alpha
param.doc: Sets the constant for the first-order filter. The filter is updated by the equation Avg = (1-Alpha)*Avg + Alpha*abs(in)^2. The output is updated by the equation Out = sqrt(Avg).
